npcs.name: Gribble the Goblin Merchant
npcs.dialogue: Psst! Need any wares, adventurer? I've got trinkets from all over the dungeon!

lore: Ancient runes on the northern wall glow faintly with blue light
The air smells of moss and old stone
Faint scratching sounds echo from deeper within

quests.title: The Locked Door
quests.description: Gribble mentioned a locked door to the east. Perhaps his mysterious key fits?

events: Turn 4: DM Event - Gribble the Goblin Merchant appears!
